Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> the sufferings <S%G3804><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> abound <S%G4052><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>, even so <S%G3779><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> comfort <S%G3874><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> aboundeth <S%G4052><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> we are afflicted <S%G2346><s%>, it is for <S%G5228><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> comfort <S%G3874><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%>; or whether <S%G1535><s%> we are comforted <S%G3870><s%>, it is for <S%G5228><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> comfort <S%G3874><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> worketh <S%G1754><s%> in the patient enduring <S%G5281><s%> of the same <S%G846><s%> sufferings <S%G3804><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%>:

and our hope for you is stedfast <S%G1492><s%>; knowing that <S%G3754><s%>, as <S%G5618><s%> ye are <S%G2075><s%> partakers <S%G2844><s%> of the sufferings <S%G3804><s%>, so <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> are ye of the comfort <S%G3874><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> we would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> have <S%G50><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> ignorant <S%G50><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, concerning <S%G5228><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> affliction <S%G2347><s%> which befell <S%G1096><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Asia <S%G773><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> we were weighed <S%G916><s%> down <S%G2596><s%> exceedingly <S%G5236><s%>, beyond <S%G5228><s%> our power <S%G1411><s%>, insomuch that <S%G5620><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> despaired <S%G1820><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> of life <S%G2198><s%>:

yea <S%G235><s%>, we <S%G846><s%> ourselves have had <S%G2192><s%> the sentence <S%G610><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> we should <S%G5600><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> trust <S%G3982><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> raiseth <S%G1453><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>:

who <S%G3739><s%> delivered <S%G4506><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of so great <S%G5082><s%> a death <S%G2288><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> will deliver <S%G4506><s%>: on <S%G1519><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we have set our hope <S%G1679><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he will <S%G4506><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> still <S%G2089><s%> deliver us <S%G4506><s%>;

ye <S%G5216><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> helping together <S%G4943><s%> on our <S%G2257><s%> behalf <S%G5228><s%> by your supplication <S%G1162><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%>, for the gift <S%G5486><s%> bestowed upon <S%G1519><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> by means of <S%G1537><s%> many <S%G4183><s%>, thanks may be given <S%G2168><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> persons <S%G4383><s%> on <S%G5228><s%> our behalf <S%G2257><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> glorifying <S%G2746><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> this <S%G3778><s%>, the testimony <S%G3142><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> holiness <S%G572><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sincerity <S%G1505><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> fleshly <S%G4559><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, we behaved <S%G390><s%> ourselves in <S%G1722><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> more abundantly <S%G4056><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you-ward <S%G5209><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> we write <S%G1125><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> other things <S%G243><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, than235, 2228 what <S%G3739><s%> ye read <S%G314><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> acknowledge <S%G1921><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> I hope1679, 3754 ye will acknowledge1921, 2532 unto <S%G2193><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%>:

as <S%G2531><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> ye did acknowledge <S%G1921><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> in <S%G575><s%> part <S%G3313><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> glorying <S%G2745><s%>, even as <S%G2509><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> are ours <S%G2257><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> in this <S%G3778><s%> confidence <S%G4006><s%> I was minded <S%G1014><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> first <S%G4386><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye might have <S%G2192><s%> a second <S%G1208><s%> benefit <S%G5485><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> to pass <S%G1330><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G575><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> to be set forward on my journey <S%G4311><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Judaea <S%G2449><s%>.

When I therefore <S%G3767><s%> was <S%G1011><s%> thus <S%G5124><s%> minded <S%G1011><s%>, did5100, 687 I show <S%G5530><s%> fickleness <S%G1644><s%>? or <S%G2228><s%> the things <S%G3739><s%> that I purpose <S%G1011><s%>, do I purpose <S%G1011><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> there should be <S%G5600><s%> the yea <S%G3483><s%> yea <S%G3483><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the nay <S%G3756><s%> nay <S%G3756><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> as God <S%G2316><s%> is faithful <S%G3754><s%>, our <S%G2257><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> is <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> yea <S%G3483><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> nay <S%G3756><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> was preached <S%G2784><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>, even by <S%G1223><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Silvanus <S%G4610><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%>, was <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> yea <S%G3483><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> nay <S%G3756><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> is <S%G1096><s%> yea <S%G3483><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> how many <S%G3745><s%> soever be the promises <S%G1860><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> is the yea <S%G3483><s%>: wherefore also <S%G2532><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> is the Amen <S%G281><s%>, unto <S%G4314><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> he that <S%G3588><s%> establisheth <S%G950><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> anointed <S%G5548><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>, is God <S%G2316><s%>;

who <S%G3588><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> sealed <S%G4972><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> the earnest <S%G728><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> call <S%G1941><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> for a witness <S%G3144><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> to spare <S%G5339><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> I forbare <S%G3765><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Corinth <S%G2882><s%>.

Not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we have lordship <S%G2961><s%> over your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> are <S%G2070><s%> helpers <S%G4904><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> in faith <S%G4102><s%> ye stand fast <S%G2476><s%>.
